poll_list.title: Short Ratification Poll for MIP62 Amendments (MIP4c3-SP2) - March 28, 2022

discourse_list.title: [Signal Request] Promote "MIP4c3-SP2: MIP62 Amendments" to an on-chain poll

content.content: At issue: MIP 62 amendements to reflect the off-boarding of the Content Production Core Unit (MKT-001) Considerations:  Improve clarity of a recently approved MIP by reflecting the off-boarding of the Content Production CU     Should MIP4c3-SP2 proceed to an on-chain poll?  Yes No Abstain     0 voters     This Signal Request will run until 2022-03-23T20:30:00Z. If it is successful, an on-chain ratification poll will follow as part of the Weekly Cycle, as per MIP4c3.
content.GPT-summary: The post is a signal request for promoting "MIP4c3-SP2: MIP62 Amendments" to an on-chain poll. The proposal aims to improve the clarity of a recently approved MIP by reflecting the off-boarding of the Content Production CU. The author is explaining the proposal and asking for feedback from the community. The post also includes a poll for the community to vote on whether the proposal should proceed to an on-chain poll. Some 3rd parties are asking questions and providing constructive criticism of the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: This Signal Request has passed successfully. A ratification poll will be put on-chain next week. @blimpa
This topic was automatically closed 30 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
